In cell culture, remdesivir has broad-spectrum antiviral activity against several other RNA viruses, including arenaviruses
14 and coronaviruses.
16 It was previously shown that remdesivir can efficiently inhibit SARS-CoV-1 and MERS-CoV in cell culture, including in human airway epithelial cells.
16 Remdesivir also demonstrated antiviral activity against SARS-CoV-1 and MERS-CoV in an animal model. In the MERS mouse model, remdesivir reduced lung viral loads and severe lung pathology.
17 Very recently, it was shown that remdesivir is also active against SARS-CoV-2 in cells.
